channel.title: [Server] High scores MySQL, Any base
channel.description:
Ok, im a freelance developer, and im showing people/making people high scores for any server base (delta to 711) bare in mind that i dont work for free... but then again im not expensive either... here is what the outcome will be: [img]http://phpgame.bugs3.com/overall.png[/img]
[img]http://phpgame.bugs3.com/search.png[/img] i must admit, the site template is not mine but i made dramastic changes to improve the quality also spent alot of time converting the method to work on all server bases with no MySQL drivers or code :)
if intrested Message me on moparscape, add me on skype: exotiicdeath or add me on msn: kieran_dev@hotmail.co.uk
